snippet: The agreement would allow the archdiocese to exit bankruptcy proceedings but a lawyer for the victims said the settlement amount should have been higher and criticized the archdiocese’s legal tactics.
abstract: Roman Catholic Archdiocese of Milwaukee announces $21 million joint settlement with 330 survivors of sexual abuse by clergy members; settlement must be approved by federal judge.
lead_paragraph: The agreement would allow the archdiocese to exit bankruptcy proceedings but a lawyer for the victims said the settlement amount should have been higher and criticized the archdiocese’s legal tactics.

headline.main: 330 to Share $21 Million in Abuse Settlement With Milwaukee Archdiocese
headline.print_headline: 330 to Share $21 Million in Abuse Settlement With Milwaukee Archdiocese
